updateElements.mainContentHeader: Your device will restart during the update
updateElements.mainContentSubHeader: Updates can take up to 30 minutes to complete
updateElements.mainContentText:
To begin the update, click on the Update Device button and follow the steps on-screen.

If a message is shown that states "Other updates are available", click the 
"More info..." link underneath to install them, otherwise select 
"Update/Upgrade Now".
updateElements.mainHeader: An important update is available for your device
updateElements.subHeader: This update is required by your organisation's security policy.
